thread.title: D King
thread.title_full: Wilson Amplifiers reviewed by D King

author: D King
title: D King
text: I bought this Weboost device to hopefully get reasonable cell signal strength at my parents island home. During many cell phone conversations the calls would be interrupted because of weak signal strength. I read many reviews that convinced me that the Weboost was the answer. I tried it out inside the house to see if there would be any improvement but there was signal interference due to the lack of elevation differential. Once I mounted the exterior antenna on the roof everything worked perfect.
